caption: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. Two men are cleaning a tabletop, and then another person enters and talks to them. This person appears to have a higher status but does not show any particular disdain. In another tent, a woman and another man are having a serious conversation, and the woman looks very worried. Then, in another location, on a racetrack, two knights are dueling, and they are evenly matched. In the end, one of the knights kills the other. In the audience stands, a man is discussing something related to this duel with a girl.
